text:
mapra#tIttaqM mayiq yEna# yaqmasya# baqlinAq carA#mi | 
iqhaiva san niqrava#dayEq tadEqtat tada#gnE anRuqNO Ba#vAmi | 
viSva#lOpa viSvadAqvasya# tvAq &&sa~jju#hOmyaqgdhAdEkO# &huqtAdEka#H samasaqnAdEka#H | 
tEna#H kRuNvantu BEShaqja(gm) sadaqH sahOq varE$NyaM || 
aqyaM nOq naBa#sA puqraH saq(gg)qsPAnO# aqBi ra#kShatu | 
gRuqhANAqmasa#martyai baqhavO# nO gRuqhA 
a#sann || sa tvannO# - [  ]   23
